title: Did Cheryl Sandberg suggest that the American Capitol riot wasn't organized on Facebook?
subtitle: On Facebook, the Executive Director referred to "Face Facebook capabilities to stop hatred," "standards," and "transparency."
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: When Facebook was asked if anything could be done sooner to help prevent riots in the American Capitol, Prime Minister Facebook, Prime Minister Cheryl Sandberg, said, "I believe that these events were largely organized on platforms that do not have the capacity to stop hatred, do not have our standards, and do not have our transparency."
